message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $150 for it.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $175.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $155 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob! I'll try to meet you even closer. I'll sell the product to you for $165.
I appreciate your continued willingness to work with me, Alice. I'd be willing to pay $157.50 for the product.
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob! I'll try to meet you in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $162.50.
I appreciate your efforts to meet me in the middle, Alice. I'd be willing to pay $160 for the product.
I'm really close to your offer, Bob! I'll try to meet you one more time. I'll sell the product to you for $162.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me one more time, Alice. I'd be willing to pay $160 for the product.
